document_data.name: Torntlar's Farm
document_data.mainbody: '''Torntlar's Farm''' was a farm near [[Felmorel]] in the mid–8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Geography: Torntlar's Farm was separated from [[Felmorel]] by a forest through which [[wolves]] prowled; the farm stretched for six hills. The soil in at least one hill was stony.
document_data.History: [[Habaertus Ilynker]], presumably its owner or a local farmhand, was killed by [[Saeraede Lyonora|the Slayer]] shortly after the arrival of [[Elminster Aumar]] in Felmorel during the {{yearlinkName|761}}.
